Introduction

Park Sungjin is a South Korean musician best known as the leader, main vocalist, and rhythm guitarist of the rock band DAY6 under JYP Entertainment. Born in Busan, he later moved to Seoul before joining JYP as a trainee.

Sungjin debuted with DAY6 on September 7, 2015, with the EP "The Day" and the lead single "Congratulations." Known for his distinctive vocal tone and strong stage presence, he has played a key role in shaping the band's musical direction.

On March 8, 2021, Sungjin enlisted for his mandatory military service as an active-duty soldier, temporarily halting group activities. He was discharged on September 7, 2022, marking his return to the industry.
